channel.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
channel.description:
Okay well once you run into anywhere that has to do with PVP after you run out, still shows the attack and once you click on that BAM open that players shop, how can I completely remove player shop and this attack once you run out of wildy?
Pictures: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/96/problem1ve.jpg/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img96/5429/problem1ve.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/10/problem2i.jpg/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/5180/problem2i.th.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Creative I, post:7, topic:484229”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=602465.msg4241804#msg4241804 date=1361866847]
The client holds the physical interface. While the server handles it.
[/quote]

Oh alright, so which class files will I have to fix up for this?[/quote]
Try doing one of these but backwards:

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/335091-pi-better-player-owned-shops.html
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/334081-pi-any-player-owned-shop-official-release.html

Change “google” to rune-server
the second google in each link is rs3-server (rs2)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:484229”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=602465.msg4221027#msg4221027 date=1360743202]
Okay well once you run into anywhere that has to do with PVP after you run out, still shows the attack and once you click on that BAM open that players shop, how can I completely remove player shop and this attack once you run out of wildy?

Pictures:


[/quote]
It looks like you need it to update once you exit wildy/pvp zones. And to remove player shop, you just delete everything related to it… Yes, everything.[/quote]

What do I have to update and how ? & Which files have all the player shop in it ?

[quote=“CoderOops, post:4, topic:484229”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=602465.msg4221033#msg4221033 date=1360746760]

It looks like you need it to update once you exit wildy/pvp zones. And to remove player shop, you just delete everything related to it… Yes, everything.

How would I do the update ? and dude I literally deleted so much that had to do with it.

[/quote]

There is player shop stuff in both client and server… Go them both through.[/quote]

Which files have all the player shop interfaces ?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Please Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:

It looks like you need it to update once you exit wildy/pvp zones. And to remove player shop, you just delete everything related to it… Yes, everything.
[/quote]

How would I do the update ? and dude I literally deleted so much that had to do with it.[/quote]

There is player shop stuff in both client and server… Go them both through.
